Package veslo.client.inteceptor

Interface RequestInterceptAction

All Known Subinterfaces:
InterceptAction
All Known Implementing Classes:
AllureAction, CookieAction, LoggingAction
public interface RequestInterceptAction
The interface is used in the CompositeInterceptor to indirectly handle/modify requests and chains.

Author:
Oleg Shaburov (shaburov.o.a@gmail.com) Created: 25.11.2021

    Pre-modification/processing of the Interceptor.Chain

    Pre-modification/processing of the Request
